derivation.yuyuan_name: late Old English: probably from Middle Low German and Middle Dutch gilde, of Germanic origin; related to yield

encyclopedia.content: GUILD吉他公司 GUILD吉他公司成立与1953年4月，总部设在220第四大街纽约州纽约市，已经形成以制造高品质的吉他，包括西班牙和夏威夷电箱，实木体电箱，吉他配件和吉他弦。GUILD公司初起从研究世界一流的制造高品质的声学：一个小曼哈顿吉他研讨会做起。GUILD吉他公司设立了一个两层总面积1500平方英尺的制造工厂于536珍珠街，不远处就是Dronge''''s Park Row乐器商店在1930年和40年代的旧址。GUILD蓬勃发展中的其余50年代，主要是

entry.def: A guild is an organization of people who do the same job.

means.word_mean: 1. a formal association of people with similar interests;

Sentence.sentence: In 2005, the Authors Guild of America, together with a group of US publishers, launched a class action suit (集团诉讼) against Google that, after more than two years of negotiation, ended with an announcement last October that Google and the claimants had reached an out-of-court settlement.
It ended in a victory for the Authors Guild of America
